name: Adrenal Nodule
description: Detection and characterization of an adrenal nodule.

attributes.name: Unenhanced attenuation
attributes.description: Mean attenuation in Hounsfield units (HU) of the region of interest on CT images obtained without IV contrast.

attributes.name: Enhanced attenuation
attributes.description: Mean attenuation in Hounsfield units (HU) of the region of interest on CT images obtained during the portovenous phase of enhancement, 60-70s after IV contrast administration.

attributes.name: Delayed attenuation
attributes.description: Mean attenuation in Hounsfield units (HU) of the region of interest on CT images obtained 15 min after IV contrast administration.

attributes.name: Lesion size
attributes.description: The greatest linear dimension of the adrenal lesion.
